user.title: PyCupra Configuration
user.description: Fill in My Cupra/My Seat account information

vehicle.title: Vehicle Settings
vehicle.description:
The following vehicle(s) was found. Please select the vehicle you wish to monitor and it's settings.

The S-PIN is only required for some specific operations such as lock/unlock and operations that activates the combustion engine heating.
You can leave it blank.

reauth_confirm.description:
Re-authenticate with your My Cupra/My Seat account.
Make sure to accept any new EULA in the My Cupra portal (https://cupraofficial.de) before proceeding.

set_charge_limit.name: Set charge limit
set_charge_limit.description: Is setting the upper charge limit.

set_charger_max_current.name: Set maximum charge current
set_charger_max_current.description: Is setting the maximum charge current.

current.name: Current
current.description: Maximum charge current. Text (Maximum oder Reduced/Minimum) oder integer 1-255 (1-32 = Amps, 252 = Reduced, 254 = Maximum)

set_departure_schedule.name: Set departure schedule
set_departure_schedule.description: Is setting one of the departure timers.

id.name: Id of the departure timer
id.description: Id of the departure timer, that shall be changed.

enabled.name: Activate
enabled.description: Shall the departure timer be activated or not?

recurring.name: Recurring schedule?
recurring.description: Shall the departure timer be for a single date or recurring?

date.name: Date
date.description: Departure date for a single departure timer, YYYY-MM-DD (only necessary for non-recurring departure schedules).

days.name: Day pattern
days.description: Weekyday pattern for a recurring schedule, Mon-Sun - (only necessary for recurring departure schedules).

temp.name: Temperature
temp.description: Target temperature for climatisation. (Global setting, that applies to all climatisation activities).

climatisation.name: Climatisation
climatisation.description: Shall climatisation be activated for this departure timer?

charging.name: Charging
charging.description: Shall charging of the battery be activated for this departure timer?

charge_current.name: Charge Current
charge_current.description: Maximum charge current for this departure timer. (1-254 or maximum/reduced)

charge_target.name: Charge target
charge_target.description: Charge target for the departure timer

off_peak_start.name: Start of off-peak time
off_peak_start.description: Starting time of off-peak rate, 24h HH:MM.

off_peak_end.name: End of off-peak time
off_peak_end.description: End time of off-peak rate, 24h HH:MM.
